Description: Hello and thanks for looking, up for sale is this Right Handed Ibanez RG370DXGP2 2007 Tribal Graphics Shredder Guitar. This guitar is in very good condition with minor imperfections from normal, but cared-for use (see last photo). The SKB form-fitting guitar case comes with this guitar and is also in very good condition. This 2007 Ibanez RG370DXGP2 Shredder Guitar is a really great "GO FAST" guitar. It has a Super Fast Neck and a fantastic Ibanez 370DX with a floating bridge and locking nut. Once tuned this thing NEVER goes out of tune. Dive-bombing with the tremolo is so much fun. Please view the photos and read the details below as this will confirm the quality of this guitar. The 'Buy it Now' price is $249.99 and it will be shipped with its SKB hard case within hours of receiving payment. You can buy with confidence from an established seller! The guitar has 24-frets with a 3-piece maple wizard II neck. The finger board is bound rosewood with Shark tooth inlays and a Basswood body. This model was a limited run and part of Ibanez's Graphic Print finish. This RG offers top-dollar components while not burning a hole in your wallet. The Ibanez RG370DXGP electric guitar's pickups and pickup placement provide the hard-edged cutting tone needed for heavy rock. The eye-popping pattern on the top is sure to grab attention and inspire you to new levels of creativity. Since 1987, many players have selected the Ibanez RG as their weapon of choice for visiting sonic mayhem on the metal masses. With the right choice of pickups and flat, fast necks, the RG has dive-bombed and crunched its way to classic status. As heavy as it rocks, the RG370DXGP guitar is made of basswood, a comparatively lightweight wood, which makes it very comfortable for extended playing. With a good balance of highs and lows, basswood sits right between alder and mahogany in sound character. 24 jumbo frets offer easy playing for leads and chording and the Edge III tremolo bridge lets you divebomb all night long. Specifications: Basswood bodyEdge III Locking tremolo systemWizard II neck of Maple/RosewoodSharktooth Inlays24 jumbo fretsInfinity pickups (INF3, INFS3, INF4)Nut Width: 1.72" Weight: 8.10 lbs.
Title: 2007 IBANEZ Tribal Graphics Shredder Guitar RH RG370DXGP2, Right-Handed & Case
